name: Silver Screen Sleuth
description:
Solve a murder in a glamorous 1920s Hollywood mansion in this homage to the 1983 DOS game Sleuth. The story is different each time you play. See if you can get the best ending!

Full screen recommended.

Lead design, programming, UI, audio - Samuel Axon
Writing, Ink scripting, visual assets, music, additional design - Anna Washenko

Background ambiance SFX courtesy of Tabletop Audio.
